name: Manufactura
tagline: A team of mobile app designers and developers
description:
We are a team of developers of mobile apps and websites enriched with expertise in graphic design and experience gained from projects in our own lab.
 
Assets:
Lab. We develop our own products and perform research. That’s how we gain priceless experience and improve our competences.
Excellent UX and UI. Proved by famous international awards and several large companies that trust our work.
Advanced technology. Focus on the use of the best technology stack.
Kanban. Management process concentrated on long-term partnership and risk reduction.
Security. Keeping confidential client information safe.
Values:
Aestheticism. We create a strong bond between the product and the user through the combination of rational UX/UI and emotional graphic design.
Passion for invention. We grow professionally and develop our industry by bringing something new to every product.
Desire for deep insight. We strive to understand the process in order to provide effective solutions.
